ComicInfo.Series: The Green Hornet '66 Meets the Spirit
ComicInfo.Summary:
SHOWDOWN! Green Hornet, Kato & The Spirit vs. Kid Kraken and his army, in a fully evacuated Chicago! And if our heroes somehow manage to survive the deluge of henchmen descending upon them, they MIGHT discover the mystery of the dead astronaut with the knife in his backâ€¦
